item.title: Kristin add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "There is no dishonor in losing the race. There is only dishonor in not racing because you are afraid to lose." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love." -- Wally Lamb

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Norman Maclean
item.description: "Eventually, all things merge into one, and a river runs through it. The river was cut by the world's great flood and runs over rocks from the basement of time. On some of the rocks are timeless raindrops. Under the rocks are the words, and some of the words are theirs. I am haunted by waters." -- Norman Maclean

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "You save yourself or you remain unsaved." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Kristin add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Kristin add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description:
"I dust a bit...in addition, I am at the moment writing a lengthy indictment against our century. When my brain begins to reel from my literary labors, I make an occasional cheese dip.
~Ignatius J. Reilly" -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Kristin add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "nothing can wear you out like caring about people" -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "The question, O me! so sad, recurring - What good amid these, O me, O life? That you are here - that life exists and identity, that the powerful play goes on, and you may contribute a verse." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "He smiles a lot. But I think there might be worms inside him making him smile." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Chance is the first step you take, luck is what comes afterward." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Kristin add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "It is not often that someone comes along who is a true friend and a good writer." -- E.B. White

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "War must be, while we defend our lives against a destroyer who would devour all; but I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Kristin add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "People pay for what they do, and still more for what they have allowed themselves to become. And they pay for it very simply; by the lives they lead." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "I did not count the days or the weeks or the months. Time is an illusion that only makes us pant. I survived because I forgot even the very notion of time." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "That which we manifest is before us; we are the creators of our own destiny. Be it through intention or ignorance, our successes and our failures have been brought on by none other than ourselves." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Kristin add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Susan Jane Gilman
item.description: "Good girls don't hurt other people's feelings. Good girls are not overly aggressive, competitive, or boastful. Good girls please others. But what good girls are good for is another question." -- Susan Jane Gilman

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Kelly Cutrone
item.description: "Things will change: you won't feel this way forever. And anyway, sometimes the hardest lessons to learn are the ones your soul needs most." -- Kelly Cutrone

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Barbara De Angelis
item.description: "You never lose by loving, you lose by holding back." -- Barbara De Angelis

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Pete Nelson
item.description: "Individual heart cells beat at their own rate when separated from one another, a phenomenon easily observed beneath a microscope. It has long been known that when they are pushed together, they will synchronize their pulses. Recent studies have shown, however, that heart cells begin to synchronize slightly before they touch. It is not known how they signal across this distance. Some scientists speculate that this method of communication may be able to cross great distances and may explain how social animals bond, or how pets seem to sense when their masters are coming home, or even how people fall in love, one heart calling to another." -- Pete Nelson
